name: Fusion (itch) (Bertik23)
description:
This game is my first game made in Godot and also a submition to ScoreSpace Jam #14, that is why the game looks how it looks. I run out of time fixing bugs and had no time to figure out how to make it look good, nor to fine tune the parameters.

How to play:
  • Enter name if you want to be in the leaderboard.
  • Press play.
  • Combine elements to make the one, that is labeled to make
  • If you fill your inventory you loose
Music:

Corona by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/ Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
